name: Hidden Objects 3D: Mystery
description:
Hidden Objects 3D Mystery, You have to find five objects
To pass each level, you must find all the hidden objects.

Everybody loves to play Hidden Objects no more 3D

Will you find all the hidden objects?

Hidden Objects 3D is a free game in which your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before!

The game principle is simple: Find a series of hidden objects in a world! Various objects and environments are available allowing you to replay a world several times in different configurations!


Beware of the time limit! Indeed, you have a defined period of time to find all the objects! A fast analysis is required!

Open new levels and new mysteries.
